Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we are confident it will meet your needs and expectations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $995000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who will appreciate its true value. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $995,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $995,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
